author: Staff Reporter
text:
A free one-day training programme on ‘goat farming on profitable basis’ will be held at the Krishi Vigyan Kendra in Veterinary College and Research Institute premises on Mohanur Road on January 5.

N. Akila, Senior Scientist and Head, said that the programme would cover on selection of goats, erection of shed, manufacturing fodder, feed management, and control of diseases. Farmers, members of self-help groups, youth and interested persons can participate in the training programme. For registration, visit the KVK in person or register through phone: 04286-266345 and 266650. Last date for registration is January 4.
title: Training programme in goat farming
